I never said, i didn't want your help Steve....and Ursula could not even  
=
hear the very end of her own file, until I made it louder so she could hear=
  
it...she didn't know there even was a last sentence by the spirit girl s=
he  
helped get to the Light. sf
 
 
In a message dated 1/31/2011 7:48:27 P=
.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
urkel23@... writes:

 
 
 

I don't believ=
e Bruce ever listened to loud music.  Being in a band  and 
musician is whe=
re i get the good ear to hear the communication.
 
If i can't hear anything=
 at all in a file, it's NOT there !  I think  some 
are just trying to be n=
ice.  
 
You just mentioned Ursula as one of the people that can hear your =
files,  
but in the previous post Ursula said that she can't hear anything =
in your  
files.
 
I've tried to help you with editing, but you don't want =
it.
 
-Steve

it takes more then one time to play them back, it  play all files

least 3 time to listen.  These are a few people  that do hear my 
files, it=

fr=
om playing all that loud music <g> no  offense.  It may have damaged ear 
d=
rums a bit, sf

 Time,  
urkel23@... writes:

 

Question:

I don't hear most of the fi=
les you post, but you  hear them so clearly. The 
only way to validate what=
 you hear is true,  would be to follow up with 
something that you got that=
 actually  happened.

Have you ever heard a message that cam_e true that no=
body  else heard, 
basically validating your experience?

-Steve
